column4: Hey guys... I can't seem to figure out how to make my microphone record, but not play through. (as in, it should record in software, but if I talk into the mic I don't necessarily want to hear myself in real time). How do I turn that off? I can't seem to figure it out.
That can be tricky.  Essentially, you're looking for a volume slider on the Playback side, not the recording sid.e
Yes, that is how it work in windows, but if I mute the playback side, then it won't record any more. They seem to be connected, even though logically they should be seperate
